languages.text: {n}Глаза друкари распахиваются от неожиданности. Он с шипением перехватывает вашу руку за запястье, стискивает его...{/n}
{n}The Drukhari's eyes widen in astonishment. With a hiss, he intercepts your arm, gripping your wrist...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза друкари распахиваются от неожиданности. Он с шипением перехватывает вашу руку за запястье, стискивает его...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes widen in astonishment. With a hiss, he intercepts your arm, gripping your wrist...{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes widen in astonishment. With a hiss, he intercepts your arm, gripping your wrist...{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes widen in astonishment. With a hiss, he intercepts your arm, gripping your wrist...{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes widen in astonishment. With a hiss, he intercepts your arm, gripping your wrist...{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋震惊地瞪大了眼睛，发出了嘶嘶声。他一把抓住了你的手臂，钳制住了你的手腕……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes widen in astonishment. With a hiss, he intercepts your arm, gripping your wrist...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋震惊地瞪大了眼睛，发出了嘶嘶声，在你的手中挣扎。他用利爪抓着你的手，但在你施加的威压之下，他渐渐地单膝跪在地上……{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}デュカーリは驚きに目を見開く。シューという声を漏らし、こちらの手首を掴むと手の動きを封じ…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes widen in astonishment. With a hiss, he intercepts your arm, gripping your wrist...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリは驚きに目を見開く。シューという声を漏らし、こちらの手首を掴むと手の動きを封じ…{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los ojos del Drukhari se abren de par en par. Con un siseo, intercepta tu brazo agarrándote de la muñeca...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes widen in astonishment. With a hiss, he intercepts your arm, gripping your wrist...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos del drukhari se abren de par en par. Suelta un bufido y se sacude con fuerza, clavándote los dedos en la mano e hincándose sobre una rodilla bajo la presión que ejerce tu férrea presa...{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari écarquille les yeux de stupéfaction. Avec un sifflement rageur, il intercepte votre bras et se saisit de votre poignet...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes widen in astonishment. With a hiss, he intercepts your arm, gripping your wrist...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari écarquille les yeux de stupéfaction. Avec un sifflement rageur, il tente d'échapper à votre étreinte et cherche à se saisir de vos mains, mais il tombe à genoux sous la pression que vous exercez...{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Drukhari weiten sich vor Erstaunen. Mit einem Zischen fängt er deinen Arm ab und umfasst deine Hüfte ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes widen in astonishment. With a hiss, he intercepts your arm, gripping your wrist...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Drukhari weiten sich vor Erstaunen. Mit einem Zischen fängt er deinen Arm ab und umfasst deine Hüfte ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Drukhari'nin gözleri hayretle açılıyor. Tıslıyor, kolunu yakalayıp bileğini kavrıyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes widen in astonishment. With a hiss, he intercepts your arm, gripping your wrist...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari'nin gözleri hayretle açılıyor. Tıslayarak koluna yakalayıp bileğini kavrıyor...{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
